title: Middle.Earth.Shadow.of.Mordor-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:
  
                                                                        
       Middle-Earth: Shadow of Mordor (c) Monolith Productions, Inc.

    Release Date :  9/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Action

    
    Fight through Mordor and uncover the truth of the spirit that compels
  you, discover the origins of the Rings of Power, build your legend
  and ultimately confront the evil of Sauron in this new chronicle of
  Middle-earth.

  
   - Extract
   - Burn or mount the .iso
   - Run setup.exe and install
   - copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
   - Play

   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
   online ..
